abstract: Timo Paloheimo, a blogger in Finland, has come up with a clever idea: Google Minus Google. The site is simply a way to use the Google search engine but see results that filter out Google domains like Knol, YouTube, Blogger, Orkut and many others.
snippet: Timo Paloheimo, a blogger in Finland, has come up with a clever idea: Google Minus Google. The site is simply a way to use the Google search engine but see results that filter out Google domains like Knol, YouTube, Blogger, Orkut and many others.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE 8:23 PM Added comment from Google

headline.main: Want Google Search Results Without Google Sites?
